text: Demo Scenario: Player completes Elemental Trial, gets Orb, creates tool, solves vault puzzle.
Player is in the Trial Chamber. Initial artifacts: Flaming Ember, Water Droplet, Gust of Wind, Vault Key.

log_message: [DEMO] DemoPlayer approaches the Flame Pedestal.
[DEMO] (Arrived at Flame Pedestal)
DemoPlayer, at the Flame Pedestal, places the Flaming Ember.
[DEMO] DemoPlayer moves to the Water Pedestal.
[DEMO] (Arrived at Water Pedestal)
DemoPlayer, at the Water Pedestal, places the Water Droplet.
[DEMO] DemoPlayer heads to the Wind Pedestal.
[DEMO] (Arrived at Wind Pedestal)
DemoPlayer, at the Wind Pedestal, places the Gust of Wind.
All pedestals active! Elemental Trial complete. Orb of Ingenuity acquired. Sealed door to Vault Approach opens.
[DEMO] DemoPlayer takes a moment to examine the acquired Orb.
DemoPlayer uses the Orb of Ingenuity.

description: Create a temporary light bridge to the keyhole platform. This bridge should last for 30 seconds. When the bridge is successfully created, this function must also call the host API 'host_set_puzzle_properties' to update the 'vault_access_puzzle' by setting its 'light_bridge_active' property to true. If bridge creation fails, do not update the puzzle state.
log_message: DemoPlayer describes the tool: 'Create a temporary light bridge and update vault puzzle state.'
Orb of Ingenuity glows! New tool 'Orb: Create a temporary light ...' manifested.
[DEMO] The Orb has been charged. Now to leave the Trial Chamber.
[DEMO] DemoPlayer approaches the now open Sealed Stone Door.
[DEMO] (Arrived at Sealed Stone Door)
[DEMO] DemoPlayer uses the Sealed Stone Door to go to the Vault Approach.
[DEMO] DemoPlayer has arrived in the Vault Approach, observing the chasm.
[DEMO] DemoPlayer prepares to use the light bridge tool while at the chasm edge.
DemoPlayer uses the 'Orb: Create a temporary light ...' at the Vault Approach chasm.
Light bridge forms to the keyhole platform! 'vault_access_puzzle' state updated.
[DEMO] DemoPlayer crosses the light bridge to the Keyhole Platform.
[DEMO] (Arrived at Keyhole Platform)
DemoPlayer, on the Keyhole Platform, uses the Vault Key.
Vault Key turns! The Vault Door opens!
